Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பெயக்கண்டும் நஞ்சுண்டமைவர் நயத்தக்க நாகரிகம் வேண்டு பவர்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Those who desire (to cultivate that degree of) urbanity which all shall love, even after swallowing the poison served to them by their friends, will be friendly with them.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person of supreme courtesy ('நாகரிகம் வேண்டுபவர்') is at a banquet. A supposed friend is pouring a dark, swirling poison ('நஞ்சு') into their cup, and they see it happen ('பெயக்கண்டும்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Despite knowing they are being poisoned, the courteous person calmly and gracefully drinks from the cup without showing any anger or accusation, maintaining a pleasant and civil demeanor.
Layered_Composition.Background: The atmosphere of the banquet remains undisturbed and pleasant, solely due to the incredible self-control and grace of the person who chooses civility over conflict, even in the face of betrayal.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Those who desire a pleasing and courteous nature will maintain their grace and composure even to the point of knowingly accepting poison from another, just to preserve civility.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The act of knowingly and calmly drinking the poison is a powerful, extreme metaphor for the commitment to courtesy and the avoidance of conflict.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Graceful, controlled, courteous to the extreme, civilized, composed.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The scene is lit with the warm, rich light of a banquet. The poison is the only dark, menacing element, creating a stark contrast with the person's calm reaction.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A close-up on the person's face, capturing their calm, knowing expression as they drink the poison.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, cinematic, with a focus on subtle emotion and the texture of the liquid.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Dramatic, warm lighting (like candlelight) to create an intimate and intense atmosphere.

Negative_Prompt: person shouting or fighting, poison being spilled, chaotic banquet, text artifacts.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the look of the poison.
